name: Best Upsell for WooCommerce
author: identixweb

sections.description:
Take your WordPress eCommerce business to the next level with this all-in-one WooCommerce plugin for Cart Upselling & Cross selling. Offer Ultimate Deals and Offers to your customers to double-up your conversions.

Best Upsell For Woocommerce is the only Plugin to offer side cart drawer + full cart upsell. Before checkout, the cart is your last opportunity to upsell more items.

Our Plugin Compatible with :-
Product Add-Ons for WooCommerce
WOOCS (For MultiCurrency)


Multiply your sales by adding this FREE WooCommerce Upsell & Cross-selling plugin!

Inspiring from the growth Shopify stores made with our Shopify Upselling app iCart Cart Drawer Cart Upsell, we developed Best Upsell for WooCommerce merchants. We want to make sure you also excel in your eCommerce business. Do you think it is worth giving it a try?

With the Best Upsell for WooCommerce plugin, you can easily create bump sales to boost your sales and skyrocket Average Order Value (AOV)! The Free version of Best Upsell allows you to make your WooCommerce store conversion-ready. 🚀

  • Add multiple product upsells in Cart Items & Checkout widgets
  • Place multiple Checkout buttons with product upsells
  • Allow customers to apply coupon/discount codes in their shopping cart
  • Add the “Continue Shopping” button to the cart drawer
  • Offer different discount offers in the cart upsell

🔥 KEY FEATURES OF BEST UPSELL🔥

✨ Cart Upsell & Cross-sell

Most of the successful store merchants believe that cart upsell is the most effective technique to persuade customers to buy more. With Best Upsell, you can add multiple product upselling offers at different sections of your cart drawer

  • Display upsell product based on various criteria
  • Exclude products by the product tags
  • Offer percentage or fixed amount discount on product upsell

✨ Popular Upselling Widgets

Best Upsell for WooCommerce gives you different tools to create unique in cart upsell offers and generate more revenue. Add these widgets to your store and attract new as well as existing customers.

  • Progress Bar– create multiple discount offers that work together, e.g. discount with free shipping
  • Cart Items – show in cart upsells with the products added by customers
  • Product Upsells – offer exciting offers on similar or related products
  • Checkout Button – provide a super easy buying process to customers and add option Terms and conditions checkbox before checkout proceed
  • Product recommendation – show related products or best sellers or trending products Countdown timer to create cart urgency
  • Custom HTML – customize your shopping cart using custom codes to make it more personalized for your customers
  • Product Bundle – attract more customers by creating bundles of products that go best with each other
  • Discount – put an additional discount section in your cart
  • Survey – ask questions to your customers that are important to improve your e-commerce store
  • Image with text – tell more about your brand with enriching content on the cart
  • Birthday collector – ask your customers to share their birthdates to get special offers

✨ Fully Customizable

Best Upsell gives you control over the plugin user interface. You can easily customize the shopping cart and make it suitable for your store theme. You can improve the shopping for your customers by offering an amazing ajax cart drawer experience.

  • Add title/headings to each section
  • Change product image and button layout
  • Adjust the text size, color, background color, icon color, etc.
  • Add multiple CTA buttons

✨ Advanced Analytics

Enjoy all the insights of the detailed analysis at a single glance! Track the performance of every widget individually and make necessary changes in your cart upsell.
Best Upsell offers you the following insights for different durations:

  • Total Revenue generated by Best Upsell
  • Total Orders generated by Best Upsell
  • Average Order value
  • Return of investment (ROI)
  • Total store orders
  • Total impressions by Best Upsell
  • Individual widget impressions, clicks, orders, revenue, click-through rate (CTR), conversions, conversion rate (CVR), and many more.

✨ Spark Your Cart Page

The FullCart builder helps you to build and customize your full cart page with our stunning and helpful widgets like offers, product upsell, survey section, checkout buttons, and many more to increase your sale.

✨ Floating Cart Bubble

Using Best Upsell, you can add a sticky cart bubble to your WooCommerce store. It will help your customers to access their shopping cart quickly.

  • Modify the cart icon and bubble color
  • Set the Cart bubble position
  • Show cart item count

✨ Ready-made Cart Template

It’s understandable if you don’t have time to design the cart template. We have prepared one after analyzing the top-most successful eCommerce stores. Therefore you can save your time and effort by using our ready-made cart template, or you can create it on your own.

✨ Cart Urgency Timer

Limited time offers works better. Therefore, showing a countdown timer for either an offer or an entire shopping cart can help you secure more sales in less time.

✨ Highly Responsive UI

Best Upsell helps you create mobile-friendly templates for your slide cart. Therefore, you can stay relaxed about your website design. While customizing the templates, you can also preview the web as well as mobile layout.

✨ Coming Soon

The premium version of Best Upsell is about to arrive with lots of cart upselling and cross-selling features. Let’s see what to expect in Best Upsell:

  • Product reviews from the best reviews apps

🔥 MAKE IT YOURS 🔥

Are you ready to expand your WooCommerce store functionalities with a single plugin? Add Best Upsell Now to boost your sales and offer a seamless shopping experience to your customers.

GET PLUGIN SUPPORT! 📒

  • For tutorials and popular questions, go to our Best Upsell Helpdesk.
  • Please feel free to clear your doubts with our expert team! Visit our Plugin’s Forum.
  • For more information about features, FAQs, and blogs, check out our website: Best Upsell for WooCommerce.

STAY TUNED FOR THE LATEST UPDATES! 📌

  • Join us on Facebook.
  • Join us on Reddit.
  • Watch our tutorials on YouTube Channel.
  • Please don’t forget to rate us on WordPress 🙂
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

Notes

You must have an SSL certificate
Pretty permalinks in Settings > Permalinks so that the custom endpoints are supported.
Default permalinks will not work.

Free shipping setting you must have to enable free shipping like below

  • Go to admin >> WooCommerce >> Settings >> Shipping >> Edit your shipping zone https://prnt.sc/22ww6gb
  • Then add Free Shipping method https://prnt.sc/22wwg7j
  • edit “Free shipping requires…” => A valid free shipping coupon https://prnt.sc/22wws8u

How to change Currency setting from Woocommerce

Go to Admin >> Woocommerce >> settings >> Click on General tab : https://prnt.sc/–8OcSlOMjHh
Scroll down and Changes Currency position : https://prnt.sc/H17OB-MmFThz
And It Will Take 5 Min to changes to Currency Position

Third party cache setting

Wp Super Cache

Go to Admin >> Settings >> WP Super Cache >> Click on Advance tab : https://prnt.sc/26b2qup
Scroll down and remove code from Rejected Cookies and add woocommerce_items_in_cart : https://prnt.sc/26b2skw

Wp Fastest Cache

Go to Admin >> Wp Fastest Cache >> Click on Exclude tab >> In Exclude Cookies Add New Rule : https://prnt.sc/26b2xwv
Open Cookie DropDown And Select Has Woocommerce Items in Cart And Save It : https://prnt.sc/26b2yhi
Your Exclude Cookies Tab Look Like : https://prnt.sc/26b31w7

WP-Optimize – Clean, Compress, Cache

Go to Admin >> WP-Optimize >> Click on Cache Tab : https://prnt.sc/UDNdRjnflQ5G
Inside Cache tab Go Advanced Settings Tab And add woocommerce_items_in_cart : https://prnt.sc/26b2x2y

WP Rocket

GO to admin >> WP Rocket : https://prnt.sc/8fR8T1OBQnJn
GO to File Optimization And Find Excluded CSS Files : https://prnt.sc/ujU6tPysghzA
And Add in Excluded CSS Files Add = bu.identixweb.com/icart/assets/css/icart_fronted.min.css
And Scroll Down And Find Excluded JavaScript Files : https://prnt.sc/jyo70uh-YwS4
And Add in Excluded CSS Files Add = bu.identixweb.com/icart/assets/js/icart.min.obf.js

LiteSpeed Cache

Go to Admin >> LiteSpeed Cache >> Page Optimization >> Click on [2] Js Settings Tab >> Set This Setting : https://prnt.sc/P0_ktFxp5oCj
Go to [7] Tuning Tab : https://prnt.sc/58NOC7qjykhg
Add icart_fronted.min.css This Line Inside CSS Excludes Tab
Add icart.min.obf.js This Line Inside JS Exclude Tab
Add icart.min.obf.js This Line Inside JS Deferred Exclude Tab : https://prnt.sc/sbxZVD0m8s7r

Cache Enabler

Go to Admin >> Setting >> Cache Enabler >> Add woocommerce_items_in_cart In Cookies Tab And Save it : https://prnt.sc/26b3cwm

Plugin installation and Activation

  1. Download the plugin
  2. Upload the folder “best-upsell-for-woocommerce” to wp-content/plugins (or upload a zip through the WordPress admin)
